name: stabilized portal
description: As you gaze into the seemingly infinite depths of this portable hole in reality, a phrase from a time forever gone echoes in your mind.  "There are two things that are infinite: the universe and human kleptomania."

A frame capable of rotating a full 360 degrees, capable of mounting multiple weapon systems either welded directly onto it or secured via the straps.  It comes with a easily modified container for ammunition storage, a rudimentary ammo feed system for easy access, and a section for a movement system.  It is controlled by a targeting AI that can adapt to the usage of whatever weapon that has been loading, with proper programming.
